        public static int getPower(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack)
        Get the power level of the given ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item to check.
        Returns:
        The power this Mace currently has.

      • setPower

                            int power)
        Set the power level of the given ItemStack.

      • onPowerableItemItemRightClick

        public static boolean onPowerableItemItemRightClick(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack itemStack,
                                                    net.minecraft.world.World world,
                                                    net.minecraft.entity.player.PlayerEntity player,
                                                    int powerLevels,
                                                    boolean onSneak)
        Should be called by powerable items on right click.
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item stack, this will possibly have an updated power level.
        world - The world.
        player - The player
        powerLevels - The maximum power levels.
        onSneak - If the action should be executed for a sneaking player.
        Returns:
        If the power level was changed.
